other_tests.findings: The tumor was composed of adipocytes of various sizes in a fibromyxoid background. Atypical spindle cells with hyperchromatic and enlarged nuclei were present, as well as scattered lipoblasts without areas of dedifferentiation.
The laryngeal mass was excised with negative margins.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The wound had healed well 1 month after surgery, and the patient regained normal swallowing ability within 2 weeks.

other_tests.findings: A well-circumscribed mass of approximately 3×3×2 cm, with a smooth surface, located at the laryngeal side of the left aryepiglottic fold covering nearby structures including the bilateral vocal cords and left pyriform sinus.
